column1: Title: "Efficacy of Semaglutide in a Subcutaneous and an Oral Formulation"
FUNDING: Novo Nordisk (review of sponsored trials)
FOLLOW_UP_MONTHS: Varied (30-56 weeks across SUSTAIN trials)
OUTCOME_HBA1C_ARM1_MD: "Semaglutide 1.0mg vs sitagliptin: MD -0.8% (95% CI -1.0 to -0.7)"
OUTCOME_HBA1C_ARM2_MD: "Semaglutide 0.5mg vs sitagliptin: MD -0.5% (95% CI -0.7 to -0.4)"
OUTCOME_WEIGHT_ARM1_MD: "Semaglutide 1.0mg vs sitagliptin: MD -3.6 kg (95% CI -4.2 to -3.0)"
OUTCOME_WEIGHT_ARM2_MD: "Semaglutide 0.5mg vs sitagliptin: MD -2.4 kg (95% CI -3.0 to -1.8)"
EXTRACTION_UNCERTAINTIES: "Review of multiple trials - effect sizes are aggregated"
EXTRACTION_NOTES: "Comprehensive review of SUSTAIN program showing consistent semaglutide efficacy across trials"
TITLE: Efficacy of Semaglutide in a Subcutaneous and an Oral Formulation
INCLUSION_CRITERIA: T2DM patients from SUSTAIN program
